record.text:
Merv Astra and myself were unjustly imprismed by the Council for crimes we did not commit and by a vote with ballots that were spoiled. 

I formally request a re-vote and opportunity to speak to the Council to clear our names. I have brought @therubydragon.bsky.social whose ballots were spoiled!

post.text:
Merv Astra and myself were unjustly imprismed by the Council for crimes we did not commit and by a vote with ballots that were spoiled. 

I formally request a re-vote and opportunity to speak to the Council to clear our names. I have brought @therubydragon.bsky.social whose ballots were spoiled!

record.text:
The events of yesterday, the most beloved spring holiday, will not be forgotten. 

Silusa! @silusa.bsky.social I demand justice!

Your creatures not only devoured the entire Pantry Day Stew, they devoured several villagers! And sent the rest fleeing.

This terror must end.

Ok! Julian tells me there’s a problem — first I’m hearing of this! 

So what’s up Wizard I’m very busy with… problems

So what’s up Wizard I’m very busy with… problems

record.text:
The events of yesterday, the most beloved spring holiday, will not be forgotten. 

Silusa! @silusa.bsky.social I demand justice!

Your creatures not only devoured the entire Pantry Day Stew, they devoured several villagers! And sent the rest fleeing.

This terror must end.

Hello Julian,
Thank you for your timely response. 
Please confirm within one hour if Silusa will clear my name and Merv's (my apprentice) or I will turn you into a cucumber and then pickle you.
Best wishes,
The Blue Wizard

record.text:
The events of yesterday, the most beloved spring holiday, will not be forgotten. 

Silusa! @silusa.bsky.social I demand justice!

Your creatures not only devoured the entire Pantry Day Stew, they devoured several villagers! And sent the rest fleeing.

This terror must end.

Hello The Blue Wizard,

HoC Silusa understands your concerns and is taking them very seriously. I am working diligently to ensure we can find a time to touch base on this -- rest assured I'm on it! 

This is our absolute top priority and please reach out if there's anything else I can do for you.

Blessings! 🙏🌳

I think I saw your beautiful 😍family when I saw Paul, by the Big Cauldron🫕

I'm sure everything will work out as it's meant to! It might be nice to have the whole house to yourself, like I do! 🫶❤️🏠
